text: shueb ne kaha ai meree qaum agar mai apane paravaradigaar kee taraph se raushan daleel par hoon aur usane mujhe (halaal) rozee khaane ko dee hai (to mai bhee tumhaaree tarah haraam khaane lagoon) aur mai to ye nahin chaahata ki jis kaam se tum ko rokoon tumhaare bar khilaaph (badale) aap usako karane lagoon main to jahaan tak mujhe ban pade isalaah (bhalaee) ke siva (kuchh aur) chaahata hee nahin aur meree taeed to khuda ke siva aur kisee se ho hee nahin sakatee is par maine bharosa kar liya hai aur usee kee taraph ruzoo karata hoon
